name: Dampen Magic
description: Convert a portion of your Magicka into a protective ward, gaining a damage shield that absorbs 3718 damage for 6 seconds. Damage shield strength capped at 60% of your Max Health.  Each piece of Light Armor worn increases the amount of damage absorbed by 6%.
descHeader: Requires 5 pieces of light armor equipped
effectLines: Each piece of Light Armor worn increases damage absorbed. Increases shield cap value.
coefDescription: Requires 5 pieces of light armor equipped Convert a portion of your Magicka into a protective ward, gaining a damage shield that absorbs $1 damage for 6 seconds. Damage shield strength capped at 60% of your Max Health.  Each piece of Light Armor worn increases the amount of damage absorbed by 6%.
rawDescription:
Convert a portion of your Magicka into a protective ward, gaining a damage shield that absorbs <<1>> damage for <<2>>. Damage shield strength capped at |cffffff60|r% of your Max Health.
